messages.title: A Strong and Caring Voice for Huntingdonshire
messages.content: Huntingdonshire has been my family home for almost 10 years, and the focus of my day-to-day work.

messages.title: A representative for all in Huntingdonshire
messages.content: I offer my good wishes and support to Nik Johnson and the Labour Party in this election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocates for the continuation of all services currently provided by Hinchingbrooke Hospital.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Working for local business and the local economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to investing to build a local spirit of entrepreneurship and innovation.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Respectful of the position of being your local Member of Parliament
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pledges to have the electorate's trust respected and to work for all constituents.

mentions.candidate: Pledges to be a passionate supporter of all local health services and to campaign tirelessly for continuation of all services currently provided by Hinchingbrooke Hospital.

issues.economy: I am committed to investing to build a local spirit of entrepreneurship and innovation.
issues.health: A passionate supporter of all our local health services. I will campaign tirelessly for continuation of all services currently provided by Hinchingbrooke Hospital.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to be standing for election in my home constituency. Huntingdonshire is a special place, an area rich in history and never afraid to stand up and do things differently.

politicalExperience.role: A children's doctor at Hinchingbrooke Hospital
politicalExperience.achievements: Work involving meeting, helping and supporting local people.

endorsements.endorsement: Offers good wishes and support to Nik Johnson and the Labour Party in the election.
Expresses support as parents of a severely disabled child, appreciating the NHS and the support it provides.

quotes.text: Offer my good wishes and support to Nik Johnson and the Labour Party in this election.
